summary.Title: Technical Specialist
summary.Presentation:
Technical Specialist – STENHØJHYDRAULIK in Barrit

For the Company Stenhøj Hydraulik A/S in Barrit I am looking for a Technical Specialist.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Technical Specialist – STENHØJHYDRAULIK in Barrit

For the Company Stenhøj Hydraulik A/S in Barrit I am looking for a Technical Specialist.

Are you motivated by being part of a team that design and produce advanced technical machines to customers all over the world, with focus on the environment– then you are just the person we are looking for.

ABOUT STENHOJ HYDRAULIK A/S

Since 1917, Stenhøj Hydrauklik has manufactured and marketed advanced and innovative products for the automotive and manufacturing industry.

At Stenhøj Hydraulik A/S, we specialize in the design and production of:

Electromechanical Broaching Machines, Hydraulic Presses and Hydraulic truck chassis beam bending machines

We are a highly technology driven company, specialized to deliver innovative solutions

We strive to be at the forefront of the market with creative technical solutions to complex challenges, always considering how to save energy and making the planet greener.

Things are going fast, and we must adapt to the needs of the customer and the market, why two days are never the same.

STENHOJ PRESS TECHNOLOGY into the future with reliability….

For further information: www.stenhyd.com

ABOUT THE POSITION:

As Technical Specialist at Stenhøj Hydraulik A/S you will be part of a dedicated and competent team, of 10 people, your main task will be to support the customer in finding the right solution of the design of their new machine and to follow the manufacturing of the machine from start to the delivery

You will report to our CTO

Travel can occur

The workplace will be at the company location in Barrit, but with the possibility to work from home.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Development and Design of advanced technical project from order approval to end delivery
  • 3D and 2D construction of highly technical Machines
  • Development of technical instructions and documentation including CE
  • Support Sales in defining technical solutions
  • Internal coordination
  • Technical sparring with the customer to find the perfect solution

OUR EXPECTATIONS TO YOU:

  • You hold a relevant technical education and maybe experience from a similar position
  • Experience with Design and construction of machines
  • Can make 2D and 3D drawings, (Inventor will be an advantage)
  • Experience with relevant documentation and certificates
  • You have a good cultural understanding.
  • You master English both written and spoken, German will be an advantage

As a person, you are a good colleague with a positive attitude, you have a good technical understanding a great overview, and an innovative mindset. you have a structured and detail-oriented approach to the work. You are always looking for improvements.

You are accountable and take ownership of your assignment and in addition, you are characterized by your flexibility and good communication and collaboration skills.

WE OFFER

At Stenhoj Hydraulik A/S we offer an existing job in a growing company, with a strong market position, technical challenges as well as opportunities to influence your own job, and flexible work hours.

You will have opportunities for personal and professional development in an inspiring, high performing company, that delivers advanced technical machines all over the world and has focus on the environment. Furthermore, you will have great colleagues who support each other.

The culture in Stenhøj Hydraulik is known by its passionated and dedicated colleagues and an informal working environment, where there is room for fun.

DO YOU FIND THIS POSITION INTERESTING?

Holst Larsen, is responsible for the recruitment process, and if you would like to apply this exiting position, please send your application and CV through this link: APPLY

We would like this position to be filled as soon as possible, but we are willing to wait for the right candidate. We handle the applicants on an ongoing basis, so please send you application already today.

If you have questions about this position, feel free to contact Marianne Holst Larsen on mobile 40837593 or Mail: Marianne@holstlarsen.dk
